product_name: Sierra Designs Capiz Down Jacket - Men's
long_description: Designed with flexible, breathable side panels and insulated with warm, water-repellent, 600-fill-power duck down, the men's lightweight Capiz is perfect for aerobic pursuits in very cold weather.
short_description: Designed with flexible, breathable side panels and insulated with warm, water-repellent, 600-fill-power duck down, the men's lightweight Capiz is perfect for aerobic pursuits in very cold weather.
